article:
The 'Eurail' Group G.I.E. (sometimes referred to as 'Eurorail') is a Netherlands-
based company, registered in Luxembourg, that sells passes and tickets for
European railroads. It is owned by a group of European rail carriers and
shipping companies.

Its principal products are Eurail passes (formerly known as "Europass" and
informally known as Eurorail Passes) and InterRail passes, with which a
passenger has largely unlimited ability to travel on nearly all European
railroads and some shipping lines at a fixed price per day of travel or travel
within a certain number of days. Eurail sells a variety of passes, including
those specific to two to five bordering countries, discounted passes for groups
of up to five people travelling together, or for those under 26, passes which
provide unlimited travel in a fixed period, and passes which provide a fixed
number of days of travel in a longer period. InterRail passes are only available
for European residents.
